Package arcade.potts.vis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PottsColorMaps
    Container class for commonly used color maps.
    PottsDrawer
    Container for potts-specific Drawer classes.
    PottsDrawer.PottsCells
    Extension of PottsDrawer for drawing cells.
    PottsDrawer.PottsGrid
    Extension of PottsDrawer for drawing outlines.
    PottsDrawer.SimpleEdgePortrayal2DGridWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that modifies edge color.
    PottsVisualization
    Extension of Visualization for potts models.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PottsDrawer.Plane
    Planes for visualization.
    PottsDrawer.View
    View options.
